name: Brownies
instructions: Sift and whisk dry ingredients in large mixing bowl until combined
In medium bowl, incorporate egg and other liquid ingredients
Combine wet and dry ingredients in 2-3 additions, stirring between additions
Bake 20-25 minutes until toothpick inserted comes out with a few crumbs but no liquid batter

name: Pineapple Cake
instructions: Grease cake pan and lay pineapple rings/cherries in base of pan
In saucepan over stove top melt butter and brown sugar, pouring syrup over pineapples
In large bowl whisk together dry ingredients
Cream butter and sugar until butter lightens in color, then add remaining wet ingredients
Fold dry into wet ingredients along with milk until just combined
Bake 35-40 minutes
Cool at least 10 minutes in pan or on rack before serving

name: Gingersnaps
instructions: Preheat oven to 350F
Cream together butter and sugar in medium bowl. Beat in egg and molasses
Whisk dry ingredients in large bowl, integrate wet and dry
Shape into 1/2 inch balls and flatten with thumb
Bake 8-12 minutes, cool 5 minutes on wire rack

name: Chocolate Mousse
instructions: Scoop out avocado flesh and de-pit; blend on medium intensity
Stir in cocoa powder, salt and agave
On stove, melt chocolate in saucepan and pour over mixture with soy milk
Add vanilla bean scraped in and blend one more time

name: Oreo Cheesecake
instructions: Preheat oven to 325 F
Separate Oreo cream from cookies and pour cookies into blender
Pulse cookies in blender until crumb consistency achieved
In large bowl knead butter and crumbs into crust, press into pie pan
In Ziploc bag, mash up remaining oreos into chunks
In stand mixer, incorporate oreo chunks with cream cheese and vanilla extract
Crack and add one egg at a time with mixer on low
Pour filling into pie pan and bake 50-60 minutes til set but jiggly
Refrigerate after cooling for 6 hours

name: Fruit Jello
instructions: Boil one cup of water over stove or in microwave
Stir in gelatin packet and mix with spoon until all granules dissolved
Mix in cold water and stir until thick
Chop fruit into pieces and place in large bowl
Pour jello liquid over fruit pieces
Refrigerate 120 minutes until set

name: Creme Brulee
instructions: Preheat oven to 325 F
In saucepan combine cream, vanilla and salt. Cook on low heat
Let sit and then discard vanilla bean
Beat egg yolks and sugar in separate bowl until light
Stir 1/4 of vanilla cream into mixture, pour sugar egg mixture into cream
Pour into 4 6-oz ramekins and bake
